author: Raadik, Maire
fulltext: oai:oai.datacite.org:17602313;2019-03-22T00:01:12Z;ESTDOI;ESTDOI.KEEL;Eesti õigekeelsussõnaraamatu ÕS 2018 veebiversioon;Online Dictionary of Standard Estonian ÕS 2018 ;Raadik, Maire;Center of Estonian Language Resources;2018;Issued: 2018-11-23;Updated: 2018-11-23;doi:10.15155/3-00-0000-0000-0000-079CEL;Abstract;Kajastab eesti kirjakeele normi.;Abstract;ÕS 2018 is a normative dictionary of modern standard Estonian. It shows the standardized spelling, pronunciation and inflection of words and gives recommendations on semantics and syntax. The dictionary has annexes on  abbreviations, geographical names and pronunciation of foreign names.
name: 7734eadb-46a3-5dbe-804e-58bb4ace9dfc
notes: ÕS 2018 is a normative dictionary of modern standard Estonian. It shows the standardized spelling, pronunciation and inflection of words and gives recommendations on semantics and syntax. The dictionary has annexes on  abbreviations, geographical names and pronunciation of foreign names.
title: Eesti õigekeelsussõnaraamatu ÕS 2018 veebiversioon
Online Dictionary of Standard Estonian ÕS 2018
